summary: Diff shows targeted changes to LivePage polling/program selection and adds schedule-aligned seeking inputs to VideoPlayer, plus new EPG utility support. No clear missing items for REQ-10/REQ-11 are evident from the provided snippets, but some unrelated app-wide/UI/auth feature work is referenced in modified summary/state files.
